projects.title: Laptop Price Prediction
projects.description: Built as part of a college assignment, this project uses R to predict laptop prices based on specifications. Performed data cleaning, EDA, and regression modeling to identify factors affecting price.

projects.title: Heart Disease Prediction
projects.description: Completed as part of a college assignment, this project involved building a heart disease prediction model using R. Utilized statistical analysis and classification techniques to explore medical data and identify key risk indicators.
